name: My Incubus Boyfriend
summary:
因为想要朋友，于是召唤出了魅魔（♂）

A lonely girl summons a demon from hell, who can grant her deepest and darkest desires. She wishes for him to be her friend. 

ART: Monomogi - STORY: Merryweather
info:
• 中文名: 我的魅魔男友
  • 连载杂志: LINE WEBTOON
  • 作者: Merryweatherey
  • 作画: Monomogi
  • 连载开始: 2019-12-30
